title: One more time... Atomplast logo
content:
hello   
mr and miss typophile   
   
i need to know what is this font... help me please ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010232913im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/26880.jpg)
author: degregorio2

comments.content: It looks like a customized version of [China](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010232913/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontDev/china.html) (The A is different and it's been slanted). I did a new font based on this recently called [Changeling](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010232913/http:/www.ms-studio.com/FontSales/changeling.html), but it wouldn't really match your sample. I don't know of an official digitization of China, but there are some unofficial versions such as Castcrafters' [Camp Caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010232913/http:/www.castcraft-software.com/cgi-bin/castcraft/dc2.02?135%2C256).
